name: Flow Doodle
description:
Flow Doodle - The funny way to create drawing with "glowing-liquid flow" effect. Draw with Flow Doodle, then press the "FLOW" button and you will see bright light "flowing" along your doodle strokes. You can even save your light flow doodle to photo albums and share.


KEY FEATURES:
* Fantastic animated "Light Flowing" fluid Effect
* Different Doodle Colors: Red, Green, Blue, Yellow
* Special rainbow flow color
* Save drawing to Photo Albums to share^
* Auto-hiding toolbar (auto-hide while drawing)
* Erase the previous stroke (by pressing the counter-clockwise arrow button)


ADVANCED DRAWING TIPS:
Draw a stroke slowly and you will get slower flow with more bright flows on that stroke.

REMARKS:
- Please note that flowing animation may be getting slower on complicated drawings
- You cannot sketch while in animated flow mode (i.e. after pressing the "FLOW" button). Press the color buttons to get back to sketching mode.
